name: GameTron 1000
blurb: GameTron 1000: the everlasting gobstopper of gaming.

rewards.reward: THE SALE: you'll receive a digital download of the game at the lower price of \u00a35 and a digital GameTron 1000 'Backer Certificate'.
THE GAME: you'll receive a digital download of the game and a digital GameTron 1000 'Backer Certificate'. NOTE - EXCLUSIVE TO THIS TIER: 5 exclusive GameTron PC/smartphone wallpapers.

THE AUDIO: you'll receive a digital download of the game and a digital GameTron 1000 'Backer Certificate'. This tier also includes a digital download of the game's soundtrack featuring bonus music, vocal outtakes and all of the game's sound effects.

THE ART: you'll receive a digital download of the game and soundtrack, and a digital GameTron 1000 'Backer Certificate'. This tier also includes a digital 'Making Of' art book (with your name in the book's 'special thanks').

THE TESTER: you'll receive a digital download of the game, soundtrack and 'Making Of' art book (with your name in the book's 'special thanks') and a digital GameTron 1000 'Backer Certificate'. This tier also includes access to the GameTron 1000 Beta, where you will be able to submit feedback to the dev team and be added to the game's credits as 'GameTron Test Guru'.

GAMETRON COLLECTABLE: suggest a collectable item for the GameTron 1000's database and have it added to the game's PixelPedia (alongside your name). This tier also includes a digital GameTron 1000 'SuperBacker Certificate' (featuring your creation), a digital download of the game, soundtrack and 'Making Of' art book (featuring your creation/name printed inside).

GAMETRON BOSS: suggest a boss character for the GameTron 1000's database and have it added to the game's PixelPedia (alongside your name). This tier also includes a physical GameTron 1000 'SuperBacker Certificate' (featuring your creation and signed by the dev team), a digital download of the game, soundtrack and 'Making Of' art book (featuring your creation/name printed inside).

GAMETRON ENEMY CHARACTER: suggest a non-playable character/enemy for the GameTron 1000's database and have it added to the game's PixelPedia (alongside your name). This tier also includes a physical GameTron 1000 'SuperBacker Certificate' (featuring your creation and signed by the dev team), a digital download of the game, soundtrack and 'Making Of' art book (featuring your creation/name printed inside).

GAMETRON ENVIRONMENT: suggest an environment for the GameTron 1000's database and have it added to the game's PixelPedia (alongside your name). This tier also includes a physical GameTron 1000 'SuperBacker Certificate' (featuring your creation and signed by the dev team), a digital download of the game, soundtrack and 'Making Of' art book (featuring your creation/name printed inside).

GAMETRON PLAYABLE CHARACTER: suggest a playable character to be selectable from the GameTron 1000's main menu and added to the game's PixelPedia (alongside your name). This tier also includes a physical GameTron 1000 'SuperBacker Certificate' (featuring your creation and signed by the dev team), a digital download of the game, soundtrack and 'Making Of' art book (featuring your creation/name printed inside).

SUPPORT CHARACTER: suggest a playable character to be selectable from the GameTron 1000's main menu and added to the game's PixelPedia (alongside your name). You'll also receive a hardcover version of the 'Making Of' art book (signed by the dev team) which will feature your character as a full-page image (alongside a pixelated version of you - drawn by the team). This tier also includes a physical GameTron 1000 'SuperBacker Certificate' (featuring your creation and signed by the dev team), a digital download of the game and soundtrack alongside access to the GameTron 1000 Beta build (with your name added to the game's credits under 'Special Thanks').

LEAD CHARACTER: suggest a playable character to be selectable from the GameTron 1000's main menu and added to the game's PixelPedia (alongside your name). Your character will then be used in the game's promotional material (used in future trailers and press screenshots). This tier also includes a hardcover version of the 'Making Of' art book (signed by the dev team) which will feature your character as a full-page image (alongside a pixelated version of you - drawn by the team), a physical GameTron 1000 'SuperBacker Certificate' (featuring your creation and signed by the dev team), a digital download of the game and soundtrack alongside access to the GameTron 1000 Beta build (with your name added to the game's credits under 'Special Thanks').

STAR CHARACTER: suggest a playable character to be selectable from the GameTron 1000's main menu and added to the game's PixelPedia (alongside your name). Your character will then be incorporated into the official GameTron 1000 logo which will be featured on the game's title screen and the front cover of the 'Making Of' art book (your character will also be used inside the book as a small flickbook animation). You'll also receive a one-off, high quality 20"x30" poster of your character alongside a pixelated version of you - drawn by the team. This tier also includes a hardcover copy of the 'Making Of' art book signed by the dev team, a physical GameTron 1000 'SuperBacker Certificate' (featuring your creation and signed by the dev team), a digital download of the game and soundtrack alongside access to the GameTron 1000 Beta build (with your name added to the game's credits under 'Special Thanks').
